title: Drawing, Windows, doors, church furniture (Carlo M. de Guidici)
title_raw: Windows, doors, church furniture (Carlo M. de Guidici)
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
inscribed:
Upper right: Scala per una porta piccola/di Chiesa
Below: Scala per la porta/ nobbile
Center, from left to right: Finestra di/ Chiesa - Finestra di/ Palazzo/ Nobbile - Porta nobbile/ di Chiesa - Porta di una Galleria
At right of lst inscription, from top to bottom: Modini intagliati/ fregio ornato/ bassorilievo/ nel riquatro/ fra li capile
Bottom: sausia nobbile p[er] Libreria ed armacio/ per una Sacrestia - ... per una/ canon (PDM)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Windows, doors, church furniture (Carlo M. de Guidici). Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-2159
